course_title: Sem: Developmental Psychology: The Self in Development
class_notes: Open to seniors and juniors only.  Others, permission of the instructor is required before enrolling.  If you enrolled without the instructor's permission, the department will remove you from the roster automatically.
course_description: The literature on selected topics related to the development of the young organism, both human and animal.
